name: Shivam Katare
bio: Fullstack Development | Contributer at **[ReactPlay](https://reactplay.io/)** | Technical Content Writer | DevOps Enthusiast

milestones.title: ShowwCase DevElevate Silver Winner
milestones.description: Silver winner of blogging competion named DevElevate held by ShowwCase.

milestones.title: ShowwCase GDSAugust Winner
milestones.description: Ranked top 5 among bloggers in a showcase blogging competition named GDSAugust

milestones.title: Social Summer Of Code
milestones.description: I got picked for an awesome 3-month open source program called SSOC! During this time, I had the opportunity to contribute to several amazing open source projects with varying tech stacks. It was an incredible experience, and I learned so much along the way.

milestones.title: First Job
milestones.description: I got the job as a Frontend(React JS) Developer at a Cloud Security based company.

milestones.title: First Open Source Community
milestones.description: I became a part of the amazing open source community, ReactPlay, and started contributing to it for the first time!
